The Yarniacs: A Knitting Podcast.description_highlighted: ...What are we wearing?   Frank Shawl by Joji Locatelli Sharlene's Frank Shawl Southern Spirit by Joji Locatelli Sharlene's Superhero "cape" KP Pullover by Eri Shimizu Gayle's KP Pullover   What are we stalking? First Date by Carol Sunday LämminHelläPehmoinen by Pirjo Lakkapää ja Katri Raunama Metanoia Wrap by Christina Campbell Southern Spirit by Joji Locatelli Habitation Throw by Helen Stewart Sonoma Stole by Carol Sunday Santa Fe by Carol Sunday Chevron Fringe Shawl by Susanne Sommer    What are we knitting? Moreton Bay Cardigan by Alisa Hartzel Memory Blanket by Georgie Nicolson Anthology Throw by Helen Stewart À pois Cardigan by Eri Shimizu    Thank you to our sponsor Infinite Twist!      What have we finished? Divvy by Annie Baker Designs Cowl by The Seaman's Church Institute Sharlene's easy Cowl Gossamer by Joji Locatelli Gayle's Gossamer Rafa's Hat by Joji Locatelli Gayle's Rafa's Hat   We look back at episode 123, when we talked about what we termed Knitting Oddities. This led us to discover some knitted fiber art which we would like to share with you this episode.    Katrina Sanchez On Instagram as Fiberess   Tracy Widdes On Instagram as @tracywiddess   Orly Genger On Instagram as @orlygenger   Sam Barsky On Instagram as @sambarskyknitter   Joseph Ford On Instagem as @josephfordphotography Invisible Jumper photos...

Divvy by Annie Baker Designs Cowl by The Seaman's Church Institute Sharlene's easy Cowl Gossamer by Joji Locatelli Gayle's Gossamer Rafa's Hat by Joji Locatelli Gayle's Rafa's Hat   We look back at episode 123, when we talked about what we termed Knitting Oddities. The Principles of Success.description_highlighted: ...People like to make Business overly complicated. Its not. However, the world IS changing pretty fast so youll need to know how to navigate the changes....
The Principles of Success.description_original: People like to make Business overly complicated. Its not. However, the world IS changing pretty fast so youll need to know how to navigate the changes. If you liked this episode, ill only ask one thing. Please leave a review. It matters more than you realize. Thank you & hope you enjoy --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/nathandickeson/support
